channel.title: [PI] Custom NPC's
channel.description:
cant find how to add a custom npc..i already have both the models for Corp and for Tormented Demons and just need help on adding them in...if someone has a link to a tut it wuld be greatly appreciated..and before you say "search bar" ive spent the last 2 hours doing that lol. so anyway...anyone got something?
EDIT:::::^^^^^^^^^^ not sure if the models are animated yet or not soo...tut for that too? thanks.
